data.description: Examines the effective management of behavior in organizations. Focuses on the application of theories of leadership and work motivation. Includes critical conceptual and analytical assessment of these theories. Emphasizes the management of work performance, managerial skill building, and enabling followers.
data.title: MANAGING BEHAVIOR IN ORGANIZATIONS

data.description: Presents leadership theories grounded in research in Industrial and Organizational Psychology and Organizational Behavior and the implications of those theories for practice in organizations.
data.title: LEADERSHIP THEORY AND PRACTICE
